thread.title: Houston Astros' Dallas Keuchel will show off baseball's best beard vs. Yankees (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: Houston Astros' Dallas Keuchel will show off baseball's best beard vs. Yankees (PHOTOS)

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Houston Astros' Dallas Keuchel will show off baseball's best beard vs. Yankees (PHOTOS)
text:
PLUS: Why Keuchel could give Yankees fits 
Just check out the gallery above and see it in all its glory: A crop of facial hair that's turned out to be a good luck charm of sorts. As soon as he started growing the beard, it's helped him join baseball's group of elite arms . 
So why did he start growing it in the first place? According to The Post , two friends dared him to do it. 
Will the Yankees fear the beard or cut Keuchel off in Tuesday night's Wild Card showdown? We'll find out soon enough.
